sentences.sContent: ...people doing extra jobs outside their regular jobs to supplement their incomes.
sentences.sCn: …在固定工作之余做兼职以增加收入的人们。

synos.tran: 补充，[图情]补遗；补充物；附录

phrases.pCn: 食品强化剂；食物的补充
营养补充品；营养增补剂
食品补充剂；保健品；营养品

remMethod.val: sup(表加强)+ple(满)+ment→使填满→增补， 补充

trans.tranOther: to add something, especially to what you earn or eat, in order to increase it to an acceptable level

trans.tranCn: 增补，补充；补充物；增刊，副刊
trans.tranOther: something that you add to something else to improve it or make it complete
